Transcription for 1724946

Do you ever think you would go back to South Africa?
I would.
At the moment I want to just pack my bags and just go over and never return.
But I know for a fact that if I do that I wouldn't be doing what I'm doing now.
I wouldn't be independent.
I wouldn't be working.
I wouldn't be jumping on public transport.
So in that respect I think I am lucky to be here.
If I could just pack my friends in my bag, miniaturise them and pack them in my bag and
bring them over here I think I'd be happy.
I own the sunshine as well.
